name: meal1
stepOfCooking: 1 Start by cutting tomatoes into small wedges.2Finely chop the scallion. Then crack 4 eggs into a bowl and season with ¼ teaspoon salt
column6: and 1 teaspoon Shaoxing wine. Beat eggs for a minute.3Preheat the wok over medium heat until it just starts to smoke. Then add 2 tablespoons of oil and immediately add the eggs. Scramble the eggs and remove from the wok immediately..
